entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is mentioned as speaking and making decisions.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and companion. He is mentioned as speaking and trying to protect Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's other friend and companion. She is mentioned as speaking and trying to take the Cloak.

entities.name: nagini
entities.description: Nagini is a Horcrux that Voldemort is keeping close to him. It is mentioned as being hidden near Voldemort.

relationships.description: Harry knows that Nagini is a Horcrux and that it is being kept close to Voldemort, so he needs to go to Voldemort to get near the thing.
Ron wants to protect Harry from going to Voldemort alone.
Hermione suggests using the Cloak to go and get Nagini.
Harry orders Ron to stay behind and look after Hermione.
